cast.overview: Once an architect, Frank Bannister now passes himself off as an exorcist of evil spirits. To bolster his facade, he claims his "special" gift is the result of a car accident that killed his wife. But what he does not count on is more people dying in the small town where he lives. As he tries to piece together the supernatural mystery of these killings, he falls in love with the wife of one of the victims and deals with a crazy FBI agent.
cast.title: The Frighteners

cast.overview: In 1933 New York, an overly ambitious movie producer coerces his cast and hired ship crew to travel to mysterious Skull Island, where they encounter Kong, a giant ape who is immediately smitten with the leading lady.
cast.title: King Kong

cast.overview: After the underlying tech for M3GAN is stolen and misused by a powerful defense contractor to create a military-grade weapon known as Amelia, M3GAN's creator Gemma realizes that the only option is to resurrect M3GAN and give her a few upgrades, making her faster, stronger, and more lethal.
cast.title: M3GAN 2.0

details.biography: Jim McLarty is a New Zealand actor who featured throughout the Power Rangers franchise. He is also served as the ADR supervisor for Power Rangers Ninja Steel, Power Rangers Super Ninja Steel & Power Rangers Beast Morphers
details.name: Jim McLarty
